string-array.name: crystals_q1
string-array.item: What state or phase of material are crystals?

string-array.name: crystals_q2
string-array.item: Which of the following best describes a crystal?
Molecules fit together in a repeating pattern, Molecules fit together in a random pattern, All of the above, None of the above

string-array.name: crystals_q3
string-array.item: Which of the following is not one of the seven basic crystal shapes?

string-array.name: crystals_q4
string-array.item: What type of crystals are formed in clouds when water freezes?
Snowflakes is the name for water crystals formed in the clouds.

string-array.name: crystals_q5
string-array.item: What are the seven basic shapes formed by crystals called?
Lattices is the best termfor how the crystals are internally organized.
